医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型二价疫苗对主要鱼类病原体显示出有希望的结果二价疫苗针对嗜水气单胞菌 (A. Hydrophila) 和无乳链球菌 (S. agalactiae) 的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-bivalent-vaccine-shows-promising-results-against-key-fish-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-bivalent-vaccine-shows-promising-results-against-key-fish-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80a07861-6092-4046-82e8-8b2e0c6c89f8 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:51:00 -0400 New bivalent vaccine shows promising results against key fish pathogens
带地暖的配水柜构成军团士兵患病风险挪威科学研究所 SINTEF 的研究人员一直在测试不同类型的配水柜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Water-distribution-cabinets-with-floor-heating-pose-Legionnaires-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Water-distribution-cabinets-with-floor-heating-pose-Legionnaires-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b04ad284-ccc9-4dee-a54f-1203e45484d8 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:49:24 -0400 Water distribution cabinets with floor heating pose Legionnaires' disease risk
在接受机械通气的创伤患者的常规护理中增加叹气呼吸是否会增加无需呼吸机的天数？研究人员调查了在机械通气创伤患者的标准护理方案中添加叹气呼吸是否会增加不使用呼吸机的天数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Does-adding-sigh-breaths-to-the-usual-care-of-trauma-病人-receiving-mechanical-ventilation-increase-ventilator-free-天.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Does-adding-sigh-breaths-to-the-usual-care-of-trauma-病人-receiving-mechanical-ventilation-increase-ventilator-free- days.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01e6c1ab-7f9d-4d5f-9fe3-757987892992 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Does adding sigh breaths to the usual care of trauma patients receiving mechanical ventilation increase ventilator-free days?
创伤知情护理培训可带来知识和组织变革的显着收益麦克莱恩医院对来自不同行业的 598 名人员进行了一项研究，他们参加了为期两天的培训研讨会，学习了创伤知情护理以及如何在其组织内部署这些技能，发现参与者报告在创伤知识方面取得了显着的进步，并在组织能力方面做出了改进根据培训前后收集的调查数据的比较，制定政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Trauma-informed-care-training-leads-to-significant-gains-in-knowledge-and-organizational-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Trauma-informed-care-training-leads-to-significant-gains-in-knowledge-and-organizational-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67083bfd-d5b6-4f48-95cb-b8f5d65bf97a Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:41:04 -0400 Trauma-informed care training leads to significant gains in knowledge and organizational change
尽管疫苗接种率很高，但老年人感染 COVID-19 的风险仍然最高到 2023 年 7 月，不列颠哥伦比亚省低陆平原地区约 80% 的居民已感染 SARS-CoV-2，出现严重后果的风险较低，但近一半的老年人仍未感染，且住院治疗的风险最高根据发表在 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）上的一项新研究，该研究显示，因 COVID-19 导致的死亡 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.230721。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Older-adults-still-at-highest-risk-of-COVID-19-despite-high-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Older-adults-still-at-highest-risk-of-COVID-19-despite-high-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1affb041-1994-4596-8181-e7e372d200ec Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:26:10 -0400 Older adults still at highest risk of COVID-19 despite high vaccination rates
皮肤癌病例的增加凸显了使用机器学习进行早期检测的重要性机器学习 (ML) 中的图像处理技术，用于使用临床图像检测皮肤癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Rise-in-skin-cancer-cases-underscores-importance-of-early-detection-using-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Rise-in-skin-cancer-cases-underscores-importance-of-early-detection-using-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c12d39d7-5d60-4214-b19c-e47b310e57e6 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:14:00 -0400 Rise in skin cancer cases underscores importance of early detection using machine learning
患有 COVID-19 的糖尿病患者：抗体水平低与预后较差相关抗 SARS-CoV-2 抗体水平对 T2D 患者 COVID-19 结局的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Diabetic-病人-with-COVID-19-low-antibody-levels-linked-to-worse-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Diabetic-病人-with-COVID-19-low-antibody-levels-linked-to-worse-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cf67fed-5ad5-447c-ba79-c29960f6fa7a Mon, 30 Oct 2023 08:01:00 -0400 Diabetic patients with COVID-19: low antibody levels linked to worse outcomes
爸爸们推动加州带薪家庭假计划的发展家庭平等日益增强的一个迹象是，越来越多的新爸爸要求带薪家庭假，以便在为人父母的最初几周内与孩子建立联系并支持他们的伴侣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Dads-drive-growth-in-Californiae28099s-paid-family-leave-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Dads-drive-growth-in-Californiae28099s-paid-family-leave-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a409e9ac-5012-4039-a88a-34ad03f21e53 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 07:53:04 -0400 Dads drive growth in California’s paid family leave program
根据最近的调查，日常使用止痛药不会降低同理心水平，但滥用可能会降低同理心水平一方面，低同理心和亲社会行为与镇痛药消耗之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Day-to-day-painkiller-use-doesnt-lower-empathy-levels-but-misuse-might-according-to-recent-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Day-to-day-painkiller-use-doesnt-lower-empathy-levels-but-misuse-might-according-to-recent-survey.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c6976ee-a4af-4a68-b24a-f26990c9f945 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 07:30:00 -0400 Day-to-day painkiller use doesn't lower empathy levels, but misuse might, according to recent survey
地中海饮食如何影响肥胖个体的胰岛素抵抗和敏感性？研究人员评估了肥胖个体对地中海饮食的坚持、胰岛素分泌、抵抗力和敏感性之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/How-does-the-Mediterranean-diet-impact-insulin-resistance-and-sensitivity-in-obese-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/How-does-the-Mediterranean-diet-impact-insulin-resistance-and-sensitivity-in-obese-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9483a8c3-c085-4210-94c1-8ff4f79467ba Mon, 30 Oct 2023 05:39:00 -0400 How does the Mediterranean diet impact insulin resistance and sensitivity in obese individuals?
